mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Shop(shop_id, user_email, seq_shop_idx, shop_title, shop_addr, shop_location, food_type, shop_tip, budget, shop_reserve, shop_comment, shop_view, shop_score, shop_dibs, shop_phone, shop_time, shop_addinfo, shop_tb, shop_alcohol, shop_car, shop_close) VALUES(#{shop_id}, #{user_email}, #{seq_shop_idx}, #{shop_title}, #{shop_addr}, #{shop_location}, #{food_type}, #{shop_tip}, #{budget}, #{shop_reserve}, #{shop_comment}, #{shop_view}, #{shop_score}, #{shop_dibs}, #{shop_phone}, #{shop_time}, #{shop_addinfo}, #{shop_tb}, #{shop_alcohol}, #{shop_car}, #{shop_close})
mapper.update: UPDATE Shop set shop_title=#{shop_title}, shop_addr=#{shop_addr}, shop_location=#{shop_location}, food_type=#{food_type}, shop_tip=#{shop_tip}, budget=#{budget}, shop_comment=#{shop_comment}, shop_phone=#{shop_phone}, shop_time=#{shop_time}, shop_addinfo=#{shop_addinfo}, shop_tb=#{shop_tb}, shop_alcohol=#{shop_alcohol}, shop_car=#{shop_car}, shop_close=#{shop_close} WHERE shop_id=#{shop_id}
